verses.verse: And I said<WH559>, Hear<WH8085>, I pray you<WH7218>, ye heads of Jacob<WH3290>, and rulers<WH7101> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: is it not for you to know<WH3045> justice<WH4941>?
ye who hate<WH8130> the good<WH2896>, and love<WH157> the evil<WH7451>; who pluck off<WH1497> their skin<WH5785> from off them<WH7607>, and their flesh from off their bones<WH6106>;

who also eat<WH398> the flesh<WH7607> of my people<WH5971>, and flay<WH6584> their skin<WH5785> from off them<WH6476>, and break their bones<WH6106>, and chop them in pieces<WH6566>, as for the pot<WH5518>, and as flesh<WH1320> within<WH8432> the caldron<WH7037>.

Then shall they cry<WH2199> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, but he will not answer<WH6030> them<WH5641>; yea, he will hide his face<WH6440> from them at that time<WH6256>, according as they have wrought evil<WH7489> in their doings<WH4611>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> concerning the prophets<WH5030> that make my people<WH5971> to err<WH8582>; that bite<WH5391> with their teeth<WH8127>, and cry<WH7121>, Peace<WH7965>; and whoso putteth<WH5414> not into their mouths<WH6310>, they even prepare<WH6942> war against him<WH4421>:

Therefore it shall be night<WH3915> unto you<WH2377>, that ye shall have no vision; and it shall be dark<WH2821> unto you<WH7080>, that ye shall not divine; and the sun<WH8121> shall go down<WH935> upon the prophets<WH5030>, and the day<WH3117> shall be black over them<WH6937>.
And the seers<WH2374> shall be put to shame<WH2659>, and the diviners<WH7080> confounded<WH954>; yea<WH5844>, they shall all cover their lips<WH8222>; for there is no answer<WH4617> of God<WH430>.

But as<WH199> for me<WH4390>, I am full of power<WH3581> by the Spirit<WH7307> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and of judgment<WH4941>, and of might<WH1369>, to declare<WH5046> unto Jacob<WH3290> his transgression<WH6588>, and to Israel<WH3478> his sin<WH2403>.

Hear <WH8085> this<WH7218>, I pray you, ye heads of the house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290>, and rulers<WH7101> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, that abhor<WH8581> justice<WH4941>, and pervert<WH6140> all equity<WH3477>.
They build up<WH1129> Zion<WH6726> with blood<WH1818>, and Jerusalem<WH3389> with iniquity<WH5766>.

The heads<WH7218> thereof judge<WH8199> for reward<WH7810>, and the priests<WH3548> thereof teach<WH3384> for hire<WH4242>, and the prophets<WH5030> thereof divine<WH7080> for money<WH3701>: yet they lean<WH8172> upon Jehovah<WH3068>, and say<WH559>, Is not Jehovah<WH3068> in the midst<WH7130> of us<WH7451>? no evil shall come upon us<WH935>.

Therefore shall Zion<WH6726> for your sake<WH1558> be plowed<WH2790> as a field<WH7704>, and Jerusalem<WH3389> shall become heaps<WH5856>, and the mountain<WH2022> of the house<WH1004> as the high places<WH1116> of a forest<WH3293>.
